column3: str

What's a musicking station without handheld carrotlights? A <hex:021A020203>sad<hex:021A020103> musicking station. And Managingway won't stand for it.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Keepingway.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
Speak with Keepingway.

<hex:0208F202D8E4E8050AFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF20281><hex:0208F2027BE4E8050BFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF20224><hex:0208F2021EE4E8050CFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF201C7><hex:0208F201C1E4E80509FF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF2016A><hex:0208F20164E4E8050DFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF2010D><hex:0208F20107E4E8050EFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFB3><hex:0208AFE4E8050FFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FF5A><hex:020856E4E80510FF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
According to recent surveys, the availability of handheld carrotlights has dramatically increased overall musicking satisfaction.
But a review of data from the past three cycles reveals that we must increase production of said lights by six percent if we are to meet current demand.
I have asked Keepingway to procure additional supplies and begin assembly immediately, so could you offer them your assistance?
By my whiskers am I glad to see you! When Managingway told me how many lights we needed to make, I thought I might cry.
We're currently short on decorative parts, so could you handle those? The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.
We're currently short on handles, so could you craft some of those? The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.
We're currently short on glowy bits...um, the things that make the carrotlights light up? Y-You probably know better than I do! The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.
When you've finished, go and tell Managingway. I'll have the others start assembling from the pieces we have!
Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!
Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!
Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!
Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.
Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.
Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.
How goes carrotlight production? Have we reached our six percent?
Oh, thank goodness! With this, our Ways should be sufficiently supplied with carrotlights for the time being.
We have also received requests for a wider variety of colors, as well as improvements to the carrotlights' basic functionality. Exciting times await!
I hope I can count on your future assistance, but for now, please accept this small token of our appreciation.
